Home.notice: Try switching languages to see next-intl in action.
Home.title: Build multilingual experiences without friction
Home.subtitle: This starter ships with locale-aware routing, message loading, and client helpers so you can focus on your product.

localization.title: Localized UI copy
localization.body: Translate headings, body text, buttons, and more using organized JSON message bundles.

routing.title: Locale-prefixed routing
routing.body: Middleware ensures users are redirected to their preferred locale with clean URLs like /en or /es.

translation.title: Client & server helpers
translation.body: Use hooks such as useTranslations or server utilities to keep content consistent in every render pathway.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for could not be located.
